Bernie Sanders , I-Vt., spoke admiringly at the ceremony in Washington when Bob Jenkins was named`` America's Oldest Worker'' at age 101. Ray is an example for the young people of 70 or 80 who are asking,` Do I still have something meaningful to offer?' Sen. Bernie Sanders said in presenting Bob Jenkins with the award. Bob Jenkins ' health finally started to fail last summer, his son said. Edna Bob Jenkins , his wife of 74 years, died in November.

officials that united to save them.`` I didn't interview Michael Vick for this book because to me the story was more about what happened afterwards, which was an amazing thing,'' says Gorant. Abu Ghraib en de gevolgen ervan, zoals de beschuldigingen van` marteling' door critici van de oorlog in Irak en de president, werden een schadelijke afleiding , redeneert Donald Rumsfeld .`` Meer dan al het andere dat ik heb nagelaten te doen of mijn trots over de belangrijke dingen die we hebben bereikt, spijt het me dat ik toen niet ben vertrokken.''
